Description: No comprehensive inventory of enterprise assets exists, including end-user devices, network devices, non-computing/IoT devices, and servers.
An incomplete inventory is maintained, with some assets listed but lacking essential details such as hardware address or department ownership. Review and update process is not regularly conducted.

A basic inventory of enterprise assets exists, including the required fields (network address, hardware address, machine name, etc.). However, review and update frequency may be infrequent, leading to outdated information.

An accurate, detailed, and regularly reviewed inventory of all enterprise assets is maintained, including mobile devices supported by MDM tools. All assets are accounted for, and the inventory is updated at least bi-annually or more frequently.
Higher Ed - Level 1 - No comprehensive inventory of enterprise assets exists, including end-user devices, network devices, non-computing/IoT devices, and servers.

Higher Ed - Level 2 - An incomplete inventory is maintained, with some assets listed but lacking essential details such as hardware address or department ownership. Review and update process is not regularly conducted.

Higher Ed - Level 3 - A basic inventory of enterprise assets exists, including the required fields (network address, hardware address, machine name, etc.). However, review and update frequency may be infrequent, leading to outdated information.

Higher Ed - Level 4 - An accurate, detailed, and regularly reviewed inventory of all enterprise assets is maintained, including mobile devices supported by MDM tools. All assets are accounted for, and the inventory is updated at least bi-annually or more frequently.
